properties.name: scheduler.auto-start
properties.description: Should the internal scheduler be started. Can be [true|false].

properties.name: scheduler.startup-delay-seconds
properties.description: How long in seconds to wait after application start until the quartz triggers are fired.

properties.name: scheduler.cron-exp-export
properties.description: The Quartz cron expression used to trigger the export process.

properties.name: scheduler.cron-exp-archiving
properties.description: The Quartz cron expression used to trigger the archiving process.

properties.name: mongo.min-connections
properties.description: Mongo connection pool at least open connections.

properties.name: mongo.max-connections
properties.description: Mongo connection pool at maximum open connections.

properties.name: mongo.connect-timeout-ms
properties.description: Connection timeout to the Mongo DB in milliseconds.

properties.name: mongo.socket-timeout-ms
properties.description: Connection timeout to the Mongo DB in milliseconds.
